name: Tetrisn't (HackFight, Mobmastermod, Kyunsei, FormicaRufa, Yuweii, awiScr)
name_original: Tetrisn't (HackFight, Mobmastermod, Kyunsei, FormicaRufa, Yuweii, awiScr)
description:
A long time ago, in a space factory far far away were four-blocks pieces painted and assembled, to be dropped in an array.

What do you mean it's like Tetris ? It's absolutely not Tetris ! It's Tetrisn't !

Tetrisn't require two player and two controllers (the game is optimised for Xbox controllers)

Unlike Tetris, in Tetrisn't you have to make four blocks of the same collor touch each other to make them disappear, and not create a line how one could think.

Controls 

Player 1 : 

  • Buttons : paint the blocks
  • Left stick : left and right to move the piece, center click to drop the piece

Player 2:

  • B button : Pick/place blocks
  • Left stick: chose where to place the block
